translation.EscolaOnline: Your online school powerful and profitable
translation.EadCompleto: Have your own 100% white label online school with social network, gamification, subscription club, ecommerce and complete EAD system.
translation.Queremos: We want the student to feel comfortable while learning
translation.PlanoDeEstudos: Create study plans specifying classes and/or courses and defining the order that your students should study.
translation.ColecaoPlaylist: Turn a collection into a playlist to watch videos and audios offline sequence.
translation.MelhorExperiência: Create collections, add content, reorganize items and leave everything in your way to improve the experience.
translation.VejaRecursos: See all the other resources available to help you
